title: RPG Soundtrack 100 Tracks
description: RPG Soundtrack Pack is a high-quality pack of 100 tracks for royalty-free use in video games, created by Bobby Cole.
longDescription:
"RPG Soundtrack" by Bobby Cole is a rich collection of 100 royalty-free tracks that enhance the immersive experience of role-playing games. With themes that range from heroic to mystical, each piece supports the journey of adventure and exploration, adding depth and emotion to epic quests and encounters.


Listen to my RPG Soundtrack Sampler here: https://soundcloud.com/bobbycole/rpg-soundtrack-sampler


Once you've purchased this pack, feel free to contact me directly at hello@bobbycole.co.uk. I'm available to provide additional services such as track adjustments, consultation to select the best-suited tracks for your game, and custom music composition, all for an additional fee.


This Mega Pack includes 100 tracks:

  • 5 hours of music
  • 100 original high-quality tracks
  • Unlimited Royalty-Free license

Â 

Tracks details:

  • Audio sample rate: 44.1 kHz
  • Format: .wav
  • Bit depth: 16 bit
  • Loopable: No
technicalDetails:

  • Adventures of a Knight
  • Blue Heart
  • Deep in the Dark
  • Entrance to the Ball
  • Fantasy Light Angel
  • Fire the Cannons
  • Georgian Times
  • Fountains of Youth
  • Island Exploration
  • King of the Mermaids
  • Ocean Shanty
  • Pirate Fun
  • Pixie Dust
  • Sunset Dreams
  • and many more


Number of Audio Wavs: 100

Number of Audio Cues: 100

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 5 hours 28 minutes

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: bobbycole.co.uk
